passive.name: FURY OF THE XER'SAI
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) FURY OF THE XER'SAI
                                Rek'sai generates Fury by Attack and hitting with basic abilities. She consumes this Fury while Burrowed to restore health.

q.name: (Q) QUEEN'S WRATH / PREY SEEKER
q.description:
(Q) QUEEN'S WRATH / PREY SEEKER
Rek'Sai's next 3 basic attacks deal bonus Physical Damage to nearby enemies. While Burrowed, Rek'Sai launches a burst of void-charged earth that deals Physical Damage and reveals enemies hit.

w.name: (W) BURROW / UN-BURROW
w.description:
(W) BURROW / UN-BURROW
Rek'Sai burrows into the ground, gaining new abilities and increased Move Speed. Her vision range is reduced and she cannot use basic attacks. While Burrowed, Rek'Sai may cast Un-burrow to knock up and damage nearby enemies.
notes: range is reduced and she cannot use basic attacks

e.name: (E) FURIOUS BITE / TUNNEL
e.description:
(E) FURIOUS BITE / TUNNEL
Rek'Sai bites her target, dealing double and True Damage if she has max Fury. While Burrowed, Rek'Sai creates a re-usable, long lasting tunnel. Enemies can destroy it by standing on top of either entrance.

r.name: (R) VOID RUSH
r.description:
(R) VOID RUSH
Rek'sai passively marks targets by damaging them. She can activate this ability to become briefly untargetable and lunge at a marked target for heavy damage based on their missing health.

passive.name: BREAK THE MOLD
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) BREAK THE MOLD
                                Rell attacks slowly but steals her target's Armor and Magic Resist on hit, dealing bonus damage based on the amount stolen.

q.name: (Q) SHATTERING STRIKE
q.description:
(Q) SHATTERING STRIKE
Rell thrusts her lance to deal magic damage to units in a line, breaking their Shields. The first unit hit additionally suffers Break the Mold's defense steal. If Rell is bound to an ally with Attract and Repel, they both recover health for each enemy champion hit by this spell.

w.name: (W) FERROMANCY: CRASH DOWN
w.description:
(W) FERROMANCY: CRASH DOWN
Passive: Rell gains additional Move Speed while mounted and additional Armor and Magic Resist while armored. Active: Rell changes forms, casting a different spell based on form. Mounted: Rell crashes down in her armor, knocking enemies up and gaining a large shield. Armored: Rell forms her mount, gaining a burst of speed and flipping the next enemy she attacks.

e.name: (E) ATTRACT AND REPEL
e.description:
(E) ATTRACT AND REPEL
Rell binds a piece of her Armor to another allied champion to grant them Armor and Magic Resist while near. While she has an ally bound in this way, Rell can cast this ability without targeting an allied champion to snap the binding and Stun enemies caught in it.

r.name: (R) MAGNET STORM
r.description:
(R) MAGNET STORM
Rell explodes in a magnetic fury, violently Pulling nearby enemies towards herself. Then Rell constantly Drags nearby enemies towards herself for a short while, dealing magic damage over time.

passive.description:
(PASSIVE) LEVERAGE
                                Renata's Attacks deal bonus damage and mark enemies. Renata's allies can damage marked enemies to deal bonus damage.

q.name: (Q) HANDSHAKE
q.description:
(Q) HANDSHAKE
enata sends out a missile rooting the first enemy hit, and can recast the ability to throw the unit in a direction.

w.name: (W) BAILOUT
w.description:
(W) BAILOUT
Renata buffs an allied champion to fight harder, delaying their death and potentially saving them if they get a takedown.

e.name: (E) LOYALTY PROGRAM
e.description:
(E) LOYALTY PROGRAM
Renata sends out a pair of chemtech missiles, shielding allies and damaging and slowing enemies hit.

r.name: (R) HOSTILE TAKEOVER
r.description:
(R) HOSTILE TAKEOVER
Renata sends out a wave of chemicals, causing any enemies hit to go Berserk.

passive.name: GET EXCITED!
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) GET EXCITED!
                                Scoring a takedown on a champion or structure that Jinx has damaged within the last 3 seconds grants her 140% decaying Movement Speed and 12% Total Attack Speed for 6 seconds.While Excited, Jinx can exceed the Attack Speed cap.

q.name: (Q) SWITCHEROO!
q.description:
(Q) SWITCHEROO!
 1s   20 
                                
                                
                                Swaps weapons.Fishbones, the Rocket Launcher: Attacks cost Mana but gain 80/95/110/125 range and explode to deal 110% damage to the target and enemies around it.Pow-Pow, the Minigun: Attacks grant bonus Attack Speed for 2.5 seconds. This effect stacks up to 3 times for a total bonus of 35/60/85/110%.Pow-Pow's stacks fall off one at a time and will only benefit the first attack fired from Fishbones.
notes: range and explode to deal 110% damage to the target and enemies around it

w.name: (W) ZAP!
w.description:
(W) ZAP!
 8/7/6/5s   50/60/70/80 
                                
                                
                                Fires a shock blast that deals 103 physical damage (10/80/150/220 + 160% ) to the first enemy hit, granting vision of it and slowing it by 30/40/50/60% for 2 seconds.Decreases with attack speed (fastest when the attack speed bonus reaches 140%).

e.name: (E) FLAME CHOMPERS!
e.description:
(E) FLAME CHOMPERS!
 15/13/11/9s   70 
                                
                                
                                Tosses out three chompers that arm after a brief delay.Chompers explode on contact with enemy champions, interrupting their dashes and rooting them for 1.45/1.55/1.65/1.75 seconds. Enemies hit by the explosion take 70 magic damage (70/140/210/280 + 100% ).Chompers last for 5 seconds and will explode automatically if no champion triggers them.

r.name: (R) SUPER MEGA DEATH ROCKET!
r.description:
(R) SUPER MEGA DEATH ROCKET!
 50/45/40s   100 
                                
                                
                                Fires a mega-rocket that gains damage and speed over the first second it travels.The rocket explodes on the first enemy champion hit, dealing 25 to 250 physical damage (25/35/45 + 15% bonus  to 250/350/450 + 150% bonus ) plus 25/30/35% of their missing health. Nearby enemies take 80% damage.Deals a max of 500/650/800 damage to epic monsters.

passive.name: JUNKYARD TITAN
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) JUNKYARD TITAN
                                Every ability Rumble casts generates Heat.While above 50 Heat, Rumble enters the Danger Zone, causing his basic abilities to gain bonus effects. When he reaches 150 Heat, he becomes Overheated for 4 second(s).Overheated: Silences himself, but gains 55% bonus Attack Speed () and empowers his attacks to deal additional magic damage equal to 5 (2.5 + 2.5 () + 20% ) plus 5% of the target's max Health.Percent damage Is limited to 65-150 () on monsters.

q.name: (Q) FLAMESPITTER
q.description:
(Q) FLAMESPITTER
 8/7/6/5s  
                                
                                
                                Ignites his flamethrower, dealing 150 (150/190/230/270 + 110% ) plus 6/8/10/12% of the target's max Health as magic damage over 3 second(s). The flamethrower deals 105% of this damage against minions.Danger Zone: Deals 225 (225/285/345/405 + 165% ) plus 9% of the'target's max Health as magic damage instead.Percent damage is limited to 65-150 damage () on monsters.

w.name: (W) SCRAP SHIELD
w.description:
(W) SCRAP SHIELD
 5s  
                                
                                
                                Tosses up a barrier, gaining a shield that absorbs 87 damage (45/80/115/150 + 6% of max Health  + 35% ) for 1.5 second(s) and 20/25/30/35% Movement Speed for 1 second(s).Danger Zone: Gains 30/37.5/45/52.5% Movement Speed and a shield that absorbs 129.5 damage (67.5/120/172.5/225 + 9% of max Health  + 45% ) instead.

e.name: (E) ELECTRO HARPOON
e.description:
(E) ELECTRO HARPOON
 0.5s  
                                
                                
                                Launches an electrified harpoon, dealing 60 magic damage (60/90/120/150 + 40% ), slowing by 30/35/40/5% for 1.5 second(s), and reducing the enemy's Magic Resist by 8/12/16/20% for 4 second(s).Hitting an enemy who is already slowed by Electro Harpoon increases the slow to 45/52.5/60/67.5% and Magic Resist reduction to 12/18/24/30%.Danger Zone: The harpoon deals 90 magic damage (90/135/180/225 + 60% ) instead, and the slow and Magic Resist reduction are increased by 50%.Charge: Gains a charge every 6 second(s), storing up to 2 charges.

r.name: (R) THE EQUALIZER
r.description:
(R) THE EQUALIZER
 80/70/60s  
                                
                                
                                Launches a line of rockets that creates a burning trail on the ground on impact, dealing 700 magic damage (700/1050/1400 + 200% ) and slowing enemies in the trail by 45% over 5 second(s).Tap: Automatically searches for and attacks nearby targets based on your auto-aim settings.Drag: Drag the ability button to set the trail's starting point. After that, the ability automatically searches for and attacks nearby targets based on your auto-aim settings.Precise cast:1. Drag the ability button to set the trail's starting point. Hold until ready to cast.2. To confirm, tap the checkmark on the top left, or wait for the time limit if the Manual Aim Time Limit setting is enabled. To cancel, tap the "Back" button on the top left.3. Drag the ability button to set the trail's end point. Release to cast.Deals 30% damage to monsters.

passive.name: FURY OF THE NORTH
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) FURY OF THE NORTH
                                After being out of combat, Sejuani gains Frost Armor which grants Armor and Magic Resist and immunity to slows. Frost Armor persists for a short time after Sejuani takes damage. Sejuani can damage a stunned enemy to shatter it, dealing massive magic damage.

q.name: (Q) ARCTIC ASSAULT
q.description:
(Q) ARCTIC ASSAULT
Sejuani charges forward, knocking enemies into the air. The charge stops after hitting an enemy champion.

w.name: (W) WINTER'S WRATH
w.description:
(W) WINTER'S WRATH
Sejuani swings her mace twice, dealing damage, slowing enemies and applying Frost stacks.

e.name: (E) PERMAFROST
e.description:
(E) PERMAFROST
Sejuani freezes and stuns an enemy champion that has maximum Frost stacks.

r.name: (R) GLACIAL PRISON
r.description:
(R) GLACIAL PRISON
Sejuani throws her bola that freezes and stuns the first champion hit and creates an ice storm that slows other enemies.

passive.description:
(PASSIVE) BACKSTAB
                                Shaco's basic attacks and Two-Shiv Poison deal additional damage when striking from behind.

q.description:
(Q) DECEIVE
Shaco becomes Invisible and teleports to target location. His first attack while Invisible is empowered, dealing bonus damage and critically striking if he attacks from behind.

w.description:
(W) JACK IN THE BOX
Shaco creates a hidden animated Jack-in-the-Box. When triggered, it will fear and attack nearby enemies.

e.description:
(E) TWO-SHIV POISON
Shaco's Shivs passively poison targets on hit, slowing their Move Speed. He can throw his Shivs to deal damage and poison the target. The thrown Shiv deals bonus damage if the target is below 30% health.

r.name: (R) HALLUCINATE
r.description:
(R) HALLUCINATE
Shaco creates an illusion of himself near him, which can attack nearby enemies (Deals reduced damage to turrets). Upon death, it explodes, spawning three mini Jack in the Boxes and dealing damage to nearby enemies.

e.description:
(E) SPELL SHIELD
 22/20/18/16s  
                                
                                
                                Gains a spell shield for 2 seconds. Heals herself for 38 Health (65/70/75/80%   + 50% ) and gains Fleet of Foot when she blocks an ability.If the block fails, 50% of the ability's cooldown is refunded.

(PASSIVE) AN ACQUIRED TASTE
                                Tahm Kench puts the heft of his immense body behind his attacks, gaining extra damage based on his total health. Damaging enemy champions builds stacks of An Acquired Taste. At three stacks, he can use Devour on an enemy champion.

q.description:
(Q) TONGUE LASH
Tahm Kench lashes out with his tongue, damaging and slowing the first unit hit and healing himself if he strikes an enemy champion. Applies a stack of An Acquired Taste to enemy champions. If the champion already has 3 stacks of An Acquired Taste, they are stunned and the stacks are consumed.

w.name: (W) ABYSSAL DIVE

(W) ABYSSAL DIVE

e.description:
(E) THICK SKIN
Passive: Tahm Kench stores a percent of the damage he takes and heals based on it while out of combat. Active: Convert all stored damage into a temporary shield.

r.name: (R) DEVOUR

(R) DEVOUR
Tahm Kench devours a champion for a few seconds, dealing magic damage if they are an enemy, or shielding them if they are an ally.

passive.name: ROCK SURFING
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) ROCK SURFING
                                Taliyah gains Move Speed near walls.

q.name: (Q) THREADED VOLLEY
q.description:
(Q) THREADED VOLLEY
Taliyah throws a volley of rocks in a target direction, moving freely as she casts. This creates Worked Ground below her. If Taliyah casts Threaded Volley on Worked Ground, she consumes the ground to throw a stronger boulder that slows enemies.

w.name: (W) SEISMIC SHOVE
w.description:
(W) SEISMIC SHOVE
Taliyah causes an area of ground to erupt and throws enemies within it in a direction of her choosing.

e.name: (E) UNRAVELED EARTH
e.description:
(E) UNRAVELED EARTH
Taliyah creates a slowing minefield. If enemies dash through it or are knocked through it, the mines explode and stun them.

r.name: (R) WEAVER'S WALL
r.description:
(R) WEAVER'S WALL
Taliyah creates a very long wall and then surfs it.

passive.name: BLADE'S END
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) BLADE'S END
                                Talon's abilities apply a stack of Wound to enemy champions and large monsters hit for 6 second(s), stacking up to 3 time(s). Damaging the same target again resets Wound duration. When Talon attacks a target with 3 stack(s) of Wound, all Wound stacks are consumed to send the target into a bleeding state, dealing 80~280 physical damage (80  + 210% bonus ) over 2 second(s).Monsters are dealt 90% of this damage.The target will not gain Wound stacks during this period. If an enemy champion is killed while bleeding, Talon gains bonus Movement Speed that decays over 2 second(s).

q.name: (Q) NOXIAN DIPLOMACY
q.description:
(Q) NOXIAN DIPLOMACY
 7/6.5/6/5.5s   70/65/60/55 
                                
                                
                                Long-range cast: Dashes toward an enemy champion, dealing 75 physical damage (75/100/125/150 + 100% bonus ).Close-range cast: Stabs the target, dealing 98 physical damage (98/135/173/210 + 150% bonus  ).If this ability kills the target, Talon restores 35~70 Health (), and the ability's cooldown is reduced by 50%. The higher Armor Pen is, the faster the dash and cast speed of this ability will be. Damage from close-range casts scales with Critical Strike Damage.
notes: range cast: Dashes toward an enemy champion, dealing 75 physical damage (75/100/125/150 + 100% bonus )
range cast: Stabs the target, dealing 98 physical damage (98/135/173/210 + 150% bonus  )
range casts scales with Critical Strike Damage

w.name: (W) RAKE
w.description:
(W) RAKE
 9/8.5/8/7.5s   50/55/60/65 
                                
                                
                                Tosses daggers in a cone at the target area, dealing 35 physical damage (35/45/55/65 + 45% bonus  ) to enemies hit.Upon reaching maximum range, the daggers linger for 0.75 second(s) before returning, dealing 60 physical damage (60/100/140/180 + 100% bonus ) to enemies hit along the way and slowing them by 40/45/50/55% for 1 second(s).Deals 70% damage to monsters.

e.name: (E) ASSASSIN'S PATH
e.description:
(E) ASSASSIN'S PATH
 1s  
                                
                                
                                Vaults over the terrain or structure closest to him.Talon cannot vault over the same terrain within 135/110/85/60 second(s) of his last vault over it (cooldown per terrain decreases with Ability Haste).

r.name: (R) SHADOW ASSAULT
r.description:
(R) SHADOW ASSAULT
 70/60/50s  
                                
                                
                                First Cast: Flings out a ring of blades around himself, dealing 90 physical damage (90/130/170 + 100% bonus  ) to nearby enemies and gaining invisibility and 40/55/70% bonus Movement Speed for up to 2.5 second(s).How to recast: Tap the ability 1 second(s) after the first cast to recast. The ability will automatically be cast again when invisibility expires or is disabled.Recast: Exits invisibility and recalls the blades, dealing 90 physical damage (90/130/170 + 100% bonus  ) again to enemies hit along the way. Using attacks or Noxian Diplomacy to exit invisibility causes the blades to converge toward the target enemy instead.

passive.description:
(PASSIVE) DEADLY VENOM
                                Attacks infect enemies with venom, dealing 1/2/3/4/5 true damage (1/4/7/10/13  + 2.5% ) over 5 seconds and stacking up to 5 times.When an enemy champion has full stacks of DEADLY VENOM, Twitch gains 30% Attack Speed  for 5 seconds.Monsters take 130% increased damage from DEADLY VENOM.

q.name: (Q) AMBUSH
q.description:
(Q) AMBUSH
 15s   40

AMBUSH resets when a champion dies while infected by DEADLY VENOM.Camouflage: Hide from champions by keeping them outside Twitch's detection radius. Attacks and offensive abilities and Camouflage early.

(PASSIVE) BRIDGE BETWEEN
                                Udyr has four basic Abilities that swap between Stances and can Recast an Ability to renew it with additional benefits. Additionally, after using an Ability, Udyr's next two Attacks gain Attack Speed.

q.description:

e.name: (E) BLAZING STAMPEDE
e.description:
(E) BLAZING STAMPEDE
Udyr gains movement speed and his first attack against each target will Stun them. Recast: Gain even more movement speed and immunity to immobilizing effects for a couple seconds.

r.name: (R) WINGBORNE STORM
r.description:
(R) WINGBORNE STORM
Udyr surrounds himself in a glacial storm, damaging and slowing nearby enemies. Recast: Empower and unleash the storm, causing it to track enemies and deal additional damage.

passive.name: GLORIOUS EVOLUTION
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) GLORIOUS EVOLUTION
                                Gains Hex Fragments whenever Viktor kills an enemy:- Killing minions or normal monsters grants 3 Hex Fragments. - Killing epic monsters, siege units, or super minions grants 5 Hex Fragments. - Champion takedowns grant 25 Hex Fragments.Every 100 Hex Fragments Viktor gains permanently upgrades an active ability. When all of his basic abilities are upgraded, the Hexcore will be perfected, augmenting Chaos Storm.

q.name: (Q) SIPHON POWER
q.description:
(Q) SIPHON POWER
 8/7/6/5s   65 
                                
                                
                                Blasts an enemy, dealing 45 magic damage (45/60/75/90 + 30% ) and gaining a shield that absorbs up to 30 damage (30/55/80/105 + 15% ) over 2.5 seconds.Discharge: The next attack within 3.5 seconds deals 74 bonus magic damage (20/40/60/80 + 100%  + 40% ).Upgrade - Turbocharge: This ability's shield absorbs up to 50 damage (50/90/130/170 + 25% ), and Viktor gains 30% bonus Movement Speed for 2.5 seconds.

w.name: (W) GRAVITY FIELD
w.description:
(W) GRAVITY FIELD
 13/12/11/10s   65 
                                
                                
                                Deploys a gravity field for 4 seconds, slowing enemies within by 25/30/35/40%. After a short delay, the field applies a Gravitation stack to the target every 0.5 seconds, stacking up to 3 times.At 3 stacks, all stacks are consumed to stun the target for 1.5 seconds. The target then becomes immune to Gravitation for a short duration.Upgrade - Slow: The first time Siphon Power, Death Ray and Chaos Storm deal damage to enemies slow them by an additional 20%.

e.name: (E) DEATH RAY
e.description:
(E) DEATH RAY
 10/9/8/7s   60 
                                
                                
                                Fires a chaos beam that cuts across the battlefield in a line, dealing 75 magic damage (75/120/165/210 + 30% ) to enemies in its path.Upgrade - Blastquake: After a brief delay, an explosion follows the beam's wake, dealing 30 magic damage (30/70/110/150 + 60% ).Tap: Automatically attacks nearby targets based on your auto-aim settings.Drag: Drag the ability button to set the beam's starting point. After that, the ability automatically attacks nearby targets based on your auto-aim settings.Precise cast: 1. Drag the ability button to set the beam's starting point, and hold it until you are ready to fire.2. Tap the checkmark at the top-left corner to confirm, or the cross button near it to cancel.3. Drag the ability button to aim the beam in the target direction. Release to cast.

r.name: (R) CHAOS STORM
r.description:
(R) CHAOS STORM
 75/65/55s   100

Champion takedowns empower the storm, extending its duration by 3.5 seconds and increasing its area of effect. The storm can be empowered up to 5 time(s).The closer the storm is to Viktor, the faster it moves.

r.name: (R) ENCHANTED CRYSTAL ARROW
r.description:
(R) ENCHANTED CRYSTAL ARROW
 70/60/50s   100 
                                
                                
                                Launches a crystal arrow of ice that stuns the first champion hit and deals 200 magic damage (200/350/500 + 40% ). The stun lasts between 1.5 to 3.5 seconds, increasing with the distance of the arrow's flight.Re-cast: Hold and drag to steer the arrow's flight path. The arrow can only deviate from its original launch angle by a fixed amount. Tap the cancel button to stop steering.Manual turn speed: 45°s.

passive.name: CRIMSON PACT
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) CRIMSON PACT
                                Gains Ability Power  equal to 4.5% of Health and Bonus Health equal to 120% of Ability Power  (Both effects do not mutually stack).

q.name: (Q) TRANSFUSION
q.description:
(Q) TRANSFUSION
 9/7.5/6/4.5s  
                                
                                
                                Drains life from enemies, dealing 70 magic damage (70/100/130/160 + 60% ) and restoring 15 Health (15/20/25/30 + 35% ). When this ability's cooldown ends, generates a stack of Bloodthirst.At 2 stacks, gains 10% bonus Movement Speed (changes at levels 1/5/9/13) for 0.5 seconds and enters Crimson Rush for 2.5 seconds, gradually depleting all Bloodthirst stacks over this time.Crimson Rush: While in this state, empowers the next cast of Transfusion to deal 75% bonus damage and heal himself for 30-170 () + (5% + 0.03% ) of missing Health. When cast, consumes all Bloodthirst stacks and ends Crimson Rush. The empowered version of this ability heals for 35% against minions.

w.name: (W) SANGUINE POOL
w.description:
(W) SANGUINE POOL
 25/22/19/16s  
                                 20%
                                
                                Sinks into a blood pool, becoming untargetable for 2 seconds. Also gains 27.5% bonus Movement Speed that gradually decays over 1 seconds. While the blood pool is active, enemies within the blood pool take 32 magic damage (20/40/60/80 + 2% of Maximum Health) every 0.5 seconds and are slowed by 40%. Also restores Health equal to 15% of the damage dealt.

e.name: (E) TIDES OF BLOOD
e.description:
(E) TIDES OF BLOOD
 12.5/10/7.5/5s  
                                 8%
                                
                                Charges up to 1.5 seconds, dealing 35 magic damage (20/40/60/80 + 35%  + 2.5% of max Health) to nearby enemies. Charging can additionally increase damage by up to 100%. After charging for 1 seconds, becomes slowed by 20% and also slows any enemies hit by 40/45/50/55%.

r.name: (R) HEMOPLAGUE
r.description:
(R) HEMOPLAGUE
 90s  
                                
                                
                                Infects an area with a toxic plague that infects enemies hit for 4 seconds, after which the plague explodes, dealing 150 magic damage (150 + 70% ) to infected targets. Also deals 10% of the damage taken by the targets during the infection period as bonus magic damage. After 0.4 seconds, the first infected enemy champion restores 150 Health (150/250/350 + 70% ) to Vladimir. Every subsequent champion provides 40% healing.

passive.name: THE RELENTLESS STORM
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) THE RELENTLESS STORM
                                Volibear's gains 5% (5% + 4% ) Attack Speed for 6 seconds whenever he deals damage with an Ability or Attack, staking up to 5 times.At 5 stacks, Volibear's claws ignite with lightning, causing his Attacks to deal an additional 11~80 (11  + 40% ) magic damage to the target and 4 closest enemies.

q.name: (Q) THUNDERING SMASH
q.description:
(Q) THUNDERING SMASH
 13/12/11/10s   50 
                                
                                
                                Volibear gains 10/15/20/25% Move Speed, increased to 20/30/40/50% towards enemy champion for the next 4 seconds. While active, Volibear's next Attack deals 15 (15/40/65/90 + 100% bonus ) physical damage and Stuns the target for 1 seconds.If Volibear becomes Immobilized before he Stuns a target, Thundering Smash's duration is paused.

w.name: (W) FRENZIED MAUL
w.description:
(W) FRENZIED MAUL
 5s   35/40/45/50 
                                
                                
                                Volibear mauls an enemy, dealing 67 (5/30/55/80 + 100%  + 6.5% bonus ) physical damage. If Volibear maul's a champion or Large Monster he goes into a Frenzy for 8 seconds.If this Ability is used when in a Frenzy, its damage is increased to 108 (8/48/88/128 + 160%  + 10.4% bonus ) physical damage and Volibear restores  20/30/40/50 + 5/6/7/8% missing Health.This Ability applies on-hit effects.Deals 80% damage to monsters.

e.name: (E) SKY SPLITTER
e.description:
(E) SKY SPLITTER
 13s   60 
                                
                                
                                Volibear summons a thundercloud that fires a lightning bolt, dealing 80 (80/110/140/170 + 50% ) plus 11% max Health magic damage and Slowing by 40% for 2 seconds.If Volibear is inside the blast zone, he gains a 91 (75% ) plus 14% max Health Shild for 2.5 seconds.Damage against non-champiuons is capped at 150/250/350/450.

r.name: (R) STORMBRINGER
r.description:
(R) STORMBRINGER
 90/80/70s   100 
                                
                                
                                Volibear transforms and leaps, gaining 175/350/525 Health and 50 Attack Range for next 12 seconds.Upon landing, Volibear cracks the earth, Disabiling nearby towers for 3 seconds an dealing 300 (300/500/700 + 100%  + 210% Bonus ) physical damage to them. Nearby enemies are Slowed by 50%, decaying over 1 second. Enemies directly underneath Volibear suffering 300 (300/500/700 + 100%  + 210% bonus ) physical damage.

passive.name: MANA SURGE
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) MANA SURGE
                                Xerath's basic attacks periodically restore Mana.

q.name: (Q) ARCANOPULSE
q.description:
(Q) ARCANOPULSE
Fires a long-range beam of energy, dealing magic damage to all targets hit.
notes: range beam of energy, dealing magic damage to all targets hit

w.name: (W) EYE OF DESTRUCTION
w.description:
(W) EYE OF DESTRUCTION
Calls down a barrage of arcane energy, slowing and dealing magic damage to all enemies in an area. Targets in the middle receive additional damage and a stronger slow.

e.name: (E) SHOCKING ORB
e.description:
(E) SHOCKING ORB
Deals magic damage to an enemy and stuns them.

r.name: (R) RITE OF THE ARCANE
r.description:
(R) RITE OF THE ARCANE
Xerath immobilizes himself and gains numerous long-range barrages.

passive.name: SHEPHERD OF SOULS
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) SHEPHERD OF SOULS
                                The Cursed Horde: Yorick can summon Mist Walkers to swarm and attack nearby enemies.

q.name: (Q) LAST RITES
q.description:
(Q) LAST RITES
Yorick deals bonus damage on his next attack and heals himself. If the target dies a grave will be dug.

w.name: (W) DARK PROCESSION
w.description:
(W) DARK PROCESSION
Yorick summons a destructible wall at target location that will block enemy movement.

e.name: (E) MOURNING MIST
e.description:
(E) MOURNING MIST
Yorick throws a globule of Black Mist that damages, slows and marks enemies.

r.name: (R) EULOGY OF THE ISLES
r.description:
(R) EULOGY OF THE ISLES
Yorick summons the Maiden of the Mist that causes Yorick's attacks against the Maiden's target to deal bonus damage. The Maiden will also automatically raise Walkers from dead enemies.

passive.name: CELL DIVISION
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) CELL DIVISION
                                Each time Zac hits an enemy with an ability, he sheds a chunk of himself that can be reabsorbed to restore Health. Upon taking fatal damage, Zac splits into 4 bloblets that attempt to recombine. If any bloblets remain, he will revive with an amount of Health depending on the Health of the surviving bloblets. Each bloblet has a percentage of Zac's maximum Health, Armor and Magic Resistance. This ability has a 5 minute cooldown.

q.name: (Q) STRETCHING STRIKES
q.description:
(Q) STRETCHING STRIKES
Zac stretches an arm, grabbing an enemy. Attacking a different enemy will cause him to throw both targets towards each other.

w.name: (W) UNSTABLE MATTER
w.description:
(W) UNSTABLE MATTER
Zac explodes outward towards nearby enemies, dealing a percentage of their maximum health as magic damage.

e.name: (E) ELASTIC SLINGSHOT
e.description:
(E) ELASTIC SLINGSHOT
Zac attaches his arms to the ground and stretches back, launching himself forward.

r.name: (R) LET'S BOUNCE!
r.description:
(R) LET'S BOUNCE!
Zac bounces four times, knocking up enemies hit and slowing them.

passive.name: LIVING BATTERY
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) LIVING BATTERY
                                Zeri Shields herself for 60% of the damage she deals to Shields, and gains 15% Move Speed for 3 seconds when Shielded.

q.name: (Q) ELECTROCUTE!
q.description:
(Q) ELECTROCUTE!
 7.5/6/4.5/3s   30 
                                
                                
                                Passive: Zeri fires a burst of 6 rounds in the target direction that deal 62 physical damage  (8/10/12/14/16 + 100/102.5/105/107.5/110% ) to the first enemy hit. Zeri's attack speed has a maximum of 1.5 attacks per second. 50% of attack speed in excess of the cap is converted into bonus attack damage.Active: Zeri zaps target location, dealing 65 magic damage (35/60/85/110 + 55/70/85/100%  + 30/35/40/45% ) to enemies and slowing them by 14/18/22/26% for 2 seconds.

w.name: (W) ULTRASHOCK LASER
w.description:
(W) ULTRASHOCK LASER
 12/11/10/9s   50 
                                
                                
                                Zeri fires out an electric pulse that deals 107 magic damage (30/70/110/150 + 80%  + 40% ) to the first unit hit, slowing it by 30/35/40/45% for 2 seconds.If the pulse hits a wall, it expands into a long range laser, applying the effects in an area and crit champions and monster.
notes: range laser, applying the effects in an area and crit champions and monster

e.name: (E) SPARK SURGE
e.description:
(E) SPARK SURGE
 24/22/20/18s   80 
                                
                                
                                Zeri dashes a short distance and loads up lightning rounds for 6 seconds, empowering the next 3 Attacks to pierce, dealing 50/65/80/95% damage to targets after the first. Hitting a champion with an attack reduces this ability cooldown by 1 seconds.If Zeri touches a wall while dashing she will vault over it, greatly extending the dash range.

r.name: (R) LIGHTNING CRASH
r.description:
(R) LIGHTNING CRASH
 70/65/60s   100 
                                
                                
                                Zeri discharges a nova of electricity, dealing 150 magic damage (150/200/250 + 70% bonus  + 80% ) to all enemies nearby and gaining 8 stacks of Overcharge for each champion hit for 10 seconds. While Overcharged, Zeri gains 0.5% movement speed per stack, 25% Attack Speed and 5 bonus magic damage (5 + 15% ) on-hit.During this time, her Attack becomes a faster triple shot that chains the bonus 5 magic damage (5 + 15% ) and 24 physical damage (20% ) to nearby enemies. Hitting an enemy champion with an attack or ability adds 1 stack of Overcharge. Takedowns increase its duration by 4 seconds.

passive.name: TIME IN A BOTTLE
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) TIME IN A BOTTLE
                                 90sStores time as Experience at a rate of 20/50/80 (level 1/5/10) XP per 5 second(s). Zilean can grant this Experience to the nearest allied champion when he has enough to complete their next level up by tapping the minion button. Doing so gives Zilean the same amount of Experience. Experience can only be imparted to allies who can level up. If Zilean takes damage or is crowd controlled while imparting Experience, the process will be interrupted.

q.name: (Q) TIME BOMB
q.description:
(Q) TIME BOMB
 0.1s   60/65/70/75 
                                
                                
                                Tosses a Time Bomb to a target location. The bomb sticks to the first unit which comes within a small area around it. After 3 second(s), it detonates, dealing 75 magic damage (75/150/225/300 + 75% ) to the target and nearby enemies. The bomb prioritizes champions and units that are already carrying a bomb.Early detonation: Placing a second bomb on the same target detonates the first bomb, stunning enemies in the blast for 1.2/1.3/1.4/1.5 second(s).Charge: Stores up to 2 charge(s).   12/11.5/11/10.5 second(s).

w.name: (W) WISTED TIMEFLOW
w.description:
(W) WISTED TIMEFLOW
 13/12.5/12/11.5s   35 
                                
                                
                                Makes time flow faster for himself, applying Fleeting Time to himself and gaining a shield that absorbs 60 damage (60/85/110/135  + 45% ). Zilean also grants Fleeting Time and an identical shield to the nearest allied champion for 3 second(s).Fleeting Time: Increases projectile speed by 60% and grants 25% Movement Speed (25/25/45/55% + 6% ).While Zilean's Fleeting Time is active, his basic Ability Haste is increased by 80%.

e.name: (E) TIME WARP
e.description:
(E) TIME WARP
 25s   50 
                                
                                
                                Creates a time-bending force field for 2.5 second(s). While within the force field, enemy champions are slowed by 20% (20/25/30/35 + 5% ) and projectiles by 80%.

r.name: (R) CHRONOSHIFT
r.description:
(R) CHRONOSHIFT
 90/80/70s   125/150/175 
                                
                                
                                Places a protective time rune that lasts 5 second(s) on himself or an allied champion. If the rune bearer takes lethal damage during this time, they teleport back in time and become untargetable for 3 second(s) before they are revived and healed for 600 Health (600/850/1100 + 200% ).If the rune bearer does not trigger the rune's revival effect, 15% of Chronoshift's cooldown will be refunded.While being revived, the target becomes untargetable and invulnerable but cannot take any actions.

passive.name: MORE SPARKLES!
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) MORE SPARKLES!
                                After using an Ability, Zoe's next Attack deals an additional 16 magic damage (16 - 128 (+8 ) + 20% ).More Sparkles! deals damage instantly, and deals 50% damage to structures.

q.name: (Q) PADDLE STAR!
q.description:
(Q) PADDLE STAR!
 8/7.5/7/6.5s   50 
                                
                                
                                Zoe fires a star that deals increasing damage the further it travels to the first enemy hit dealing between 30 (30/65/100/135 + 3~52  + 60% ) and 75 (75/162.5/250/337.5 + 7.5~130  + 150% ) magic damage. Enemies surrounding the target take 80% damage.Zoe can recast this Ability to redirect the missile to a new position near Zoe.

w.name: (W) SPELL THIEF
w.description:
(W) SPELL THIEF
 0.3s  
                                
                                
                                Passive: Enemies drop spell shards when casting a Spell or using a Boot Enchantment. Specific minions also drop a spell shards when Zoe, or a nearby ally, kills them. Zoe can pick up this shard to cast that ability once.Passive: When Zoe casts this Ability or any Spell, she gains 25/30/35/40%  for 2s, and tosses 3 missiles at the target she Attacked most recently. These missiles deal 25 magic damage (25/35/45/55 + 15% ) each.Active: Cast the Ability from a spell shard Zoe has picked up.Spell shards last on the ground for 20 seconds.Each missile can apply More Sparkles!

e.name: (E) SLEEPY TROUBLE BUBBLE
e.description:
(E) SLEEPY TROUBLE BUBBLE
 15/14/13/12s   80 
                                
                                
                                After a delay, the victim falls Asleep for 2 seconds. Attacks and Ability hits wake them up, dealing 200% bonus true damage, up to 30 (30/80/130/180 + 50% ).Before the target falls Asleep, they are Drowsy, becoming increasingly slowed (up to 15/20/25/30%).

r.name: (R) PORTAL JUMP
r.description:
(R) PORTAL JUMP
 12/9/6s   50 
                                
                                
                                Zoe teleports to a nearby position for 1 second. Afterwards, she teleports back. Zoe can use Abilities and attack, but can't move during this time.

passive.name: GARDEN OF THORNS
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) GARDEN OF THORNS
                                A Thorn Spitter with 20 Health (20 + 25% ) sprouts when Grasping Roots first hits an enemy champion. If no enemy champion is hit, a Thorn Spitter will sprout when Grasping Roots ends.Thorn Spitters automatically attack targets within 6 second(s) of sprouting, dealing 10-80 magic damage (10-80 () + 13% ).An additional Thorn Spitter sprouts with every enemy champion, large monster, or epic monster Deadly Spines hits.Deals 50% of damage to monsters.Thorn Spitters spawned after the first deal 50% of damage to the same target.Enemy champions’ abilities deal 40% damage to Thorn Spitters.

q.name: (Q) DEADLY SPINES
q.description:
(Q) DEADLY SPINES
 7/6.5/6/5.5s   75 
                                
                                
                                Vines spread and burst into spines, dealing 70 magic damage (70/125/180/235 + 60% ) and sprouting 1 Thorn Spitter(s).

w.name: (W) RAMPANT GROWTH
w.description:
(W) RAMPANT GROWTH
 15/14/13/12s   50 
                                
                                
                                Plants a seed that lasts 6 second(s) on an enemy (excluding minions), dealing 5
magic damage (5/8/11/14 + 3.5% ) every 0.5 second(s) and slowing them by 15/20/25/30% for 3 second(s). Thorn Spitters deal bonus damage to targets that carry seeds.

e.name: (E) GRASPING ROOTS
e.description:
(E) GRASPING ROOTS
 12s   60 
                                
                                
                                Zyra sends binding vines forward, rooting enemies hit for 1/1.25/1.5/1.75 second(s), and dealing 60 magic damage (60/100/140/180 + 40% ).A Thorn Spitter spawns when the ability first hits an enemy champion or when it ends. (Large and epic monsters are also considered as champions.)

r.name: (R) STRANGLETHORNS
r.description:
(R) STRANGLETHORNS
 80/70/60s   100 
                                
                                
                                Zyra summons the fury of nature, growing a twisted thicket that deals 170 magic damage (170/250/330 + 60% ) to enemies. After 2 second(s), the vines snap upwards, knocking up enemies for 1 second(s). The Thorn Spitters within the thicket become enraged, resetting their duration and gaining 50% bonus Health and 50% bonus Attack Speed.
notes: duration and gaining 50% bonus Health and 50% bonus Attack Speed

passive.name: DAUNTLESS INSTINCT
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) DAUNTLESS INSTINCT
                                K'Sante's Abilities mark targets to take more damage on his next Attack.

q.name: (Q) NTOFO STRIKES
q.description:
(Q) NTOFO STRIKES
Strike a weapon forward, damaging and slowing all enemies in a short line. On hit, grants a stack for a few seconds. At 2 stacks, this skill fires a shockwave that pulls enemies in.

w.name: (W) PATH MAKER
w.description:
(W) PATH MAKER
K'Sante charges up before dashing. K'Sante is unstoppable and takes less damage while charging. Any targets hit by the dash are knocked to the end of the dash and stunned.

e.name: (E) FOOTWORK
e.description:
(E) FOOTWORK
K'Sante will dash to an ally and both will gain a shield. If there is no ally, K'Sante will still dash to the location at a reduced range and gain a shield.

r.name: (R)
r.description:
(R) 
K'Sante smashes an enemy away. If the enemy hits a wall they will go through the wall taking more damage. K'Sante will appear behind the target and goes All Out by shredding his defenses but greatly increasing his damage.

passive.name: CRIMSON CURSE
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) CRIMSON CURSE
                                Briar's attacks and abilities apply a stacking bleed that heals her for a portion of the damage it deals. Perpetually hungry, she gains increased healing based on her missing health, but lacks innate health regeneration.

q.name: (Q) HEAD RUSH
q.description:
(Q) HEAD RUSH
Briar leaps to a unit and hits enemies with The Heel Wheel (of Pain), stunning them and breaking their armor.

w.name: (W) BLOOD FRENZY / SNACK ATTACK
w.description:
(W) BLOOD FRENZY / SNACK ATTACK
Briar leaps forward and shatters her pillory, entering a Blood Frenzy that causes her to relentlessly pursue the nearest enemy (prioritizing champions). While frenzied, she gains increased attack speed and move speed, and her attacks deal damage in an area around her target. Briar can reactivate this ability while frenzied to take a CHOMP out of her target on her next attack, dealing additional damage based on their missing health, and healing Briar based on the damage she deals.

e.name: (E) CHILLING SCREAM
e.description:
(E) CHILLING SCREAM
Briar refocuses her mind, removing Blood Frenzy and channeling energy into a powerful scream that damages and slows enemies. While charging, she takes reduced damage and heals for a portion of her max health. A fully charged scream knocks foes back, dealing additional damage and stunning those who collide with a wall.

r.name: (R) CERTAIN DEATH
r.description:
(R) CERTAIN DEATH
Briar kicks her pillory's hemolith gemstone, marking the first champion it hits as her prey. She then beelines straight to them, fearing other surrounding enemies upon arriving at her target, and enters a state of complete hemomania. She will pursue her prey until death, gaining the benefits of Blood Frenzy as well as additional armor, magic Resist, lifesteal, and move speed.

 80/70/60s   100

passive.description:
(PASSIVE) SIGNATURE OF THE VISIONARY
                                Hwei primes enemy champions he damages with his abilities for his signature finishing touch. Hitting an enemy with a second damaging spell completes his signature, leaving it beneath them. The signature detonates after a short delay, dealing magic damage to all enemies in range.

q.description:
(Q) SUBJECT: DISASTER
Hwei envisions a series of disasters, allowing him to paint a devastating blow. This ability replaces Hwei's abilities with damaging abilities: Devastating Fire, Severing Bolt, and Molten Fissure.

w.name: (W) SUBJECT: SERENITY
w.description:
(W) SUBJECT: SERENITY
Hwei envisions a series of serenities, allowing him to paint invigorating settings. This ability replaces Hwei's abilities with utility abilities: Fleeting Current, Pool of Reflection, and Stirring Lights.

e.name: (E) SUBJECT: TORMENT
e.description:
(E) SUBJECT: TORMENT
Hwei envisions a series of torments, allowing him to paint controlling visages. This ability replaces Hwei's abilities with crowd control abilities: Grim Visage, Gaze of the Abyss, and Crushing Maw.

r.name: (R) SPIRALING DESPAIR
r.description:
(R) SPIRALING DESPAIR
Hwei paints a vision of pure despair. The first enemy champion struck becomes the center of an expanding painting that slows and damages nearby enemies. The vision explodes after reaching its maximum size or when the champion dies.

                                Aurora's spells and attacks exorcise spirits from the enemies she damages. Exorcised spirits follow Aurora around, healing her and granting her bonus movement speed.

                                Feint: Pushing the left joystick right after casting an ability causes Ambessa to dash a short distance in that direction.Drakehoud's Step: Ambessa's next attack within 4 seconds of triggering Feint is 50% faster, has inreased range, deals 14 bonus physical damage (14 + 2.5 () + 25% bonus ), and restores 50 Energy () (increases at level 1/6/11). Stacks 3 times.

q.name: (Q) CUNNING SWEEP / SUNDERING SLAM
q.description:
(Q) CUNNING SWEEP / SUNDERING SLAM
 9/8.5/8/7.5s   70

Damaging minions heals her for 25% of the original heal, and damaging monsters heals her for 40% of the original heal.The empowered attacks of Drakehound's Step grant the same healing bonus.Active: Seizes the farthest enemy champion in a line in front of her and blinks to them, suppressing the target for 1 second(s). During this time, she gains 30/40/50% damage reduction and is unstoppable. Ambessa then slams the target into the ground, dealing physical damage equal to 200 plus 20% of their missing Health (20/30/40% + 0.05% bonus  + 0.05% ) and stunning them for 0.4 second(s).If Public Execution does not hit an enemy champion, 35% of its cooldown will be refunded.

 2s   16

Attacks against champions reduce the time between charges by 2 seconds (2 +300% Crit Rate ) on hit.

passive.name: MARK OF THE STORM
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) MARK OF THE STORM
                                Hitting enemies with abilities places a Mark of the Storm on them for 6 seconds. At 3 stacks, the enemy is stunned for 1.25 seconds and Kennen gains 25 Energy.Stunning an enemy multiple times within 6 seconds reduces the stun duration to 0.5 seconds.

q.name: (Q) THUNDERING SHURIKEN
q.description:
(Q) THUNDERING SHURIKEN
 6,8/5,9/4,9/3,9s   60/55/50/45 
                                
                                
                                Throws a shuriken, dealing 75 magic damage (75/140/205/270 + 75% ) to the first enemy hit.

w.name: (W) ELECTRICAL SURGE
w.description:
(W) ELECTRICAL SURGE
 12/10/8/6s   40 
                                
                                
                                Passive: Every 5th attack deals 55 bonus magic damage (55/65/75/85 + 70/80/90/100% bonus  + 30% ) and applies a Mark of the Storm.Active: Shocks nearby enemies afflicted by Mark of the Storm, dealing 70 magic damage (70/100/130/160 + 80% ).

e.name: (E) LIGHTNING RUSH
e.description:
(E) LIGHTNING RUSH
 7.5/7/6.5/6s   100/95/90/85 
                                
                                
                                Transform into an electric ball for 2 seconds, becoming unable to attack but gaining 100% bonus Movement Speed and dealing 70 magic damage (70/120/170/220 + 70% ) to enemies he passes through. The bonus Movement Speed is doubled during the first 0.5 seconds. Kennen gains 50/60/70/80% Attack Speed for 3 seconds upon exiting Lightning Rush.Gains 40 Energy when Lightning Rush first damages an enemy.Deals 50% damage to minions.

r.name: (R) SLICING MAELSTROM
r.description:
(R) SLICING MAELSTROM
 80/75/70s  
                                
                                
                                Summons a storm that grants Kennen 20/40/60 Armor and Magic Resist and deals 20 magic damage (20/55/90 + 13% ) every 0.5 seconds for 3 seconds. Each subsequent bolt against the same target deals 10% increased damage.Only applies 3 Marks of the Storm to a single target.

passive.name: TOXIC SHOT
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) TOXIC SHOT
                                Attacks deal 10 bonus magic damage ((8 +  × 2) + 20% ) on impact and an additional 10 magic damage ((8 +  × 2) + 9% ) each second for 4 seconds.

q.name: (Q) BLINDING DART
q.description:
(Q) BLINDING DART
 8s   75/80/85/90 
                                
                                
                                Deals 60 magic damage (60/110/160/210 + 55% ) and blinds the target for 1.25/1.5/1.75/2 seconds.Attacks from blinded enemies will miss their target, dealing no damage and failing to apply on-hit effects.Range: 5.5.

w.name: (W) MOVE QUICK
w.description:
(W) MOVE QUICK
 17/16/15/14s   40 
                                
                                
                                Passive: Grants 15/20/25/30% Movement Speed if an enemy champion or structure has not damaged Teemo within the last 5 seconds.Active: Rolls a short distance forward and sprints (30/40/50/60% Movement Speed) for 3 seconds During this time, Move Quick's bonus is doubled and cannot be removed by damage.

e.name: (E) GUERILLA WARFARE
e.description:
(E) GUERILLA WARFARE
 25/23/21/19s   60 
                                
                                
                                After a delay, become Camouflaged. Moving outside of brush for more than 3/3.5/4/4.5 seconds ends this effect.Camouflage: Hide from champions by keeping them out of Teemo's detection radius. Enemy turrets reveal camouflaged units near them. Attacks and offensive abilities end Camouflage early.After exiting Camouflage, gain 30/40/50/60% Attack Speed for 3/4/5/6 seconds.

r.name: (R) NOXIOUS TRAP
r.description:
(R) NOXIOUS TRAP
 1s   75 
                                
                                
                                Place a mushroom trap that detonates when an enemy steps on it, dealing 125 magic damage (125/175/225 + 30% ) over 3 seconds and slowing by 30/40/50% for 3 seconds.Traps last for 2 minutes.

passive.description:
(PASSIVE) FLURRY
                                Gains 40% Attack Speed for his next 2 attacks within 3 seconds. The first attack restores 20 energy (+10 every 5 levels) and the second restores half of that amount.

q.name: (Q) SONIC WAVE / RESONATING STRIKE
q.description:
(Q) SONIC WAVE / RESONATING STRIKE
 9/8/7/6s   50 
                                
                                
                                Sonic Wave: Fires an energy wave that deals 55 physical damage (55/90/125/160 + 105% bonus ) to enemies and reveals them. Hitting an enemy allows Resonating Strike to be cast within 3 seconds.Resonating Strike: Dash to enemy marked by Sonic Wave, dealing 70 to 120 physical damage (70/130/190/250 + 105% bonus  to 120 + 210% bonus ) based on its missing Health.

w.name: (W) SAFEGUARD / IRON WILL
w.description:
(W) SAFEGUARD / IRON WILL

                                Safeguard: Dashes to target location. If an enemy is nearby on arrival, Lee Sin shields himself for 60 (60/120/180/240 + 100% ) for 2 seconds. Allows Iron Will to be cast within 3 seconds.Safeguard's cooldown is reduced by 0.5 seconds with each attack.Iron Will: Empowers next two attacks to deal an additional 26 magic damage (26/39/52/65 + 40% ) and gain 16/24/32/40% Omnivamp .

e.name: (E) TEMPEST / CRIPPLE
e.description:
(E) TEMPEST / CRIPPLE
 8s   50 
                                
                                
                                Tempest: Deals 90 magic damage (90/140/190/240 + 125% bonus ) to nearby enemies and reveals them. Hitting an enemy allows Cripple to be cast within 3 seconds.Cripple: Slows enemies hit by Tempest by 30/40/50/60% decaying over the course of 4 seconds.

r.name: (R) DRAGON'S RAGE
r.description:
(R) DRAGON'S RAGE
 70/60/50s  
                                
                                
                                Launches a powerful roundhouse kick at an enemy champion, dealing 100 physical damage (100/250/400 + 200% bonus  + 10/13/16% of the target's max Health) and knocking them back.Enemies the target collides with along the way are knocked Airborne for 1 second(s) and take 100 physical damage (100/300/500 + 200% bonus  + 10/13/16% of the target's max Health).Deals up to 800 damage to monsters.

(PASSIVE) DOUBLE STRIKE
                                Every 4th consecutive attack strikes twice for 78 physical damage (150% ).

q.name: (Q) ALPHA STRIKE
q.description:
(Q) ALPHA STRIKE
 16/15/14/13s   55/60/65/70 
                                
                                
                                Becomes untargetable and strikes up to 4 enemies for 62 physical damage (30/70/110/150 + 60% ). If there are no other targets Master Yi will strike a previous target for 25% damage.Attacks reduce the cooldown of Alpha Strike by 1 second.Deals 95/125/155/185 bonus damage to monsters.Can critically strike, dealing 60% bonus damage.

w.name: (W) MEDITATE
w.description:
(W) MEDITATE
 25s   50 
                                
                                
                                Channels for up to 4 seconds, gaining 55/60/65/70% damage reduction and healing for 40 (40/60/80/100 + 25% ) per second. During the first 0.5s of channeling, damage reduction is increased to 90%. Damage reduction effect during the first 0.5s of channeling will continue after the channeling is interrupted.The lower Master Yi's Health is, the more he heals for, up to 100% of his Health.

e.name: (E) WUJU STYLE
e.description:
(E) WUJU STYLE
 17/16/15/14s  
                                
                                
                                Passive: Gains 5 physical damage (8% ) while Wuju style is off cooldown.Active: Attacks deal 40 bonus true damage (40/45/50/55 + 25 bonus ) for 5 seconds.Active true damage vs structures:  33%.

r.description:
(R) HIGHLANDER
 70/65/60s   100 
                                
                                
                                Passive: Takedowns reduces Meditate's cooldown by 90% and Master Yi's other basic ability cooldown by 70%.Active: Becomes hasted by 35/45/55%, immune to slows for 7seconds, and gains 30/50/70% Attack Speed. Takedowns extend the duration by 7 seconds.

passive.description:
(PASSIVE) SEASTONE TRIDENT
                                Attacks deal an additional 24 magic damage (20 (+4 ) + 45% ) over 3 seconds.Deals 90% damage to monsters.

q.name: (Q) URCHIN STRIKE
q.description:
(Q) URCHIN STRIKE
 7.8/7.3/6.8/6.3s   50 
                                
                                
                                Dashes through target enemy, dealing 20 magic damage (20/40/60/80 + 50% ) plus 58 physical damage (100% ) and applying on-hit effects.

w.name: (W) RENDING WAVE
w.description:
(W) RENDING WAVE
 9.8/9.3/8.8/8.3s   30/40/50/60 
                                
                                
                                Empowers the next attack to gush water around the target, dealing 50 bonus magic damage (50/75/100/125 + 45% ) and applying Seastone Trident to enemies hit. Additional attacks within 5 seconds deal 10 bonus magic damage (10/15/20/25 + 40% ).Killing a unit with the first attack reduces Rending Wave's cooldown to 1 second.

e.name: (E) PLAYFUL / TRICKSTER
e.description:
(E) PLAYFUL / TRICKSTER
 16/114/12/10s   85/90/95/100 
                                
                                
                                Vaults to target location, becoming untargetable while balanced on the trident. After 1.2 seconds, Fizz hops down with a large splash that deals 80 magic damage (80/150/220/290 + 80% ) and slows enemies hit by 40/45/50/55% for 2 seconds.Re-cast: Hop down early towards a direction, but deal damage in a smaller splash that does not slow enemies.

r.name: (R) CHUM THE WATERS
r.description:
(R) CHUM THE WATERS
 85/70/55s   100 
                                
                                
                                Launches a fish in target direction that attaches to the first champion hit and reveals them. After 2 seconds, the fish attracts a shark that knocks up its target and knocks away enemies around them. The farther the fish travels, the larger the shark it will attract, dealing 150 to 300 magic damage (150/250/350 + 60%  to 300/400/500 + 120% ) and slowing enemies hit by 40% to 80% based on the size of the shark.If the fish does not attach to a champion, it will flop on the ground and still attract a shark at its location.

passive.name: DUELIST'S DANCE
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) DUELIST'S DANCE
                                After 2 seconds (scales with Grand Challenge's level), Reveals Vitals on nearby enemy champions. Striking a Vital deals 4% (4% + 6% bonus ) of the target's max Health as true damage, heals Fiora for 45 Health (+5 ), and grants her 30% Movement Speed (scales with Grand Challenge's level), decaying over 1.75s.Reveals a new Vitals after striking one, or after 16.75s.

q.name: (Q) LUNGE
q.description:
(Q) LUNGE
 12/10/8/6s   20/25/30/35 
                                
                                
                                Lunges in a direction and stabs a nearby enemy, dealing 75 physical damage (75/85/95/100 + 110/115/120/125% bonus ). Hitting the target refunds 50% of the Lunge's cooldown.Lunge prioritizes Vitals and enemies it will kill and applies on-hit effects to the main target.Lunge deals 50% damage to monsters and can deal damage turrets.

w.name: (W) RIPOSTE
w.description:
(W) RIPOSTE
 18/16/14/12s   50 
                                
                                
                                Parries all incoming damage and debuffs for the next 0.75 seconds. Then stabs in the target direction, dealing 120 magic damage (120/170/220/270 + 100% ) to the first enemy champion, slowing their Movement Speed and Attack Speed by 50% for 1.5 seconds.Riposte stuns instead of slows if it parries an immobilizing effect.

e.name: (E) BLADEWORK
e.description:
(E) BLADEWORK
 11/9/7/5s   30/35/40/45 
                                
                                
                                Empowers the next 2 attacks with 60% Attack Speed. The first attack applies a 30% slow for 1s, but cannot critically strike. The second attack always critically strike for 170/180/190/200% physical damage.

r.name: (R) GRAND CHALLENGE
r.description:
(R) GRAND CHALLENGE
 70/60/50s   100 
                                
                                
                                Passive: Reduces the time needed to reveal Vitals by 0.25/0.5/0.75 seconds.Active: Reveals all 4 Vitals on an enemy champion for 8 seconds and grants Duelist's Dance's Move Speed bonus while near them.If Fiora strikes all 4 Vitals in 8 seconds or if the target dies after she has hit at least one, she restore 80 Health per second (80/110/140 + 60% bonus ) to herself and nearby allied champions for  2 to 5 seconds, scaling with the number of Vitals hit.Striking all 4 Vitals  of a champion deals 14% of their max Health as true damage.
